shows the performance of our model and other baseline models on datasets Restaurant and Laptop respectively .
We can observe that our proposed PBAN model achieves the best performance among all methods .

by integrating.from sentence: Generally speaking , by integrating the position information and the bidirectional attention mechanism , PBAN achieves the state - of - the - art performances , and it can effectively judge the sentiment polarity of different aspect term in its corresponding sentence so as to improve the classification accuracy .
